description:
Leather Retreat is a camp for bdsm perverts. Sister Dee is one of them. Taken out onto the lake, strung up in a tree or bound to a wigwam, Sister Dee is hotter than the 98 degree sun... I was suffering a bit from the heat so I enlisted her real life Dominant Master Abraham to finish her off....
We were dealing with some technical issues & with the fast changing sun during this shoot so please bare with us....
title: Sweltering Hot Bondage... Sister Dee at Leather Retreat
